output_spec.commit_message: feat(healio): clinic profile and booking rules api

execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; node --import tsx --test tests/unit/clinics-route.test.ts
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Implemented protected `GET/PATCH /api/v1/clinics` with clinic profile + operating hours + booking rules payloads, Zod validation, and OWNER/ADMIN-only patch authorization. Added `clinicService` in-memory settings store to support later Settings UI and subscription guard tasks.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Changed files: healio/app/api/v1/clinics/route.ts, healio/services/clinicService.ts, healio/schemas/clinic.ts, healio/tests/unit/clinics-route.test.ts.
GET verification: route returns success envelope with clinic profile fields, booking rules, and 7 operating-hour rows for the authenticated clinic.
PATCH verification: ADMIN can update clinic profile and booking rules; persisted values are returned on subsequent GET.
RBAC/security verification: FRONT_DESK role receives `403 FORBIDDEN` on PATCH; missing auth headers receive `401 UNAUTHENTICATED`.
Validation verification: invalid bookingRules patch (negative leadTimeMinutes) is rejected with `400 INVALID_BODY`.
Typecheck/tests passed: `npm run typecheck`; `node --import tsx --test tests/unit/clinics-route.test.ts`.
Feature commit: 92bc8c8 (feat(healio): clinic profile and booking rules api).
